com.google.appinventor.server.flags

Class Flag<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.server.flags.Flag<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The flag value type.

    public abstract class Flag<T>
extends Object
    A flag associated with a system property. Values for flags are specified in the <system-properties> section of appengine-web.xml.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
